memberRoles.label: Conceptualization
memberRoles.description: Ideas; formulation or evolution of overarching research goals and aims.

memberRoles.label: Data Manager
memberRoles.description: An individual engaged in management activities to annotate (produce metadata), scrub data and maintain research data (including software code, where it is necessary for interpreting the data itself) for initial use and later re-use.

memberRoles.label: Formal analysis
memberRoles.description: Application of statistical, mathematical, computational, or other formal techniques to analyze or synthesize study data.

memberRoles.label: Funding acquisition
memberRoles.description: Acquisition of the financial support for the project leading to this publication.

memberRoles.label: Methodology
memberRoles.description: Development or design of methodology; creation of models.

memberRoles.label: Principal Investigator (PI)
memberRoles.description: An individual conducting a research and investigation process, specifically performing the experiments, or data/evidence collection.

memberRoles.label: Project Administrator
memberRoles.description: An individual with management and coordination responsibility for the research activity planning and execution.

memberRoles.label: Resources
memberRoles.description: Provision of study materials, reagents, laboratory samples, animals, instrumentation, computing resources, or other analysis tools.

memberRoles.label: Software
memberRoles.description: Programming, software development; designing computer programs; implementation of the computer code and supporting algorithms; testing of existing code components.

memberRoles.label: Supervision
memberRoles.description: Oversight and leadership responsibility for the research activity planning and execution, including mentorship external to the core team.

memberRoles.label: Validation
memberRoles.description: Verification, either in a formal analysis or through a different approach, of the results of the study.

memberRoles.label: Visualization
memberRoles.description: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work, specifically visualization/data presentation.

memberRoles.label: Writing - original draft
memberRoles.description: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work, specifically writing the initial draft (including substantive translation).

memberRoles.label: Writing - review and editing
memberRoles.description: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work by those from the original research group, specifically critical review, commentary or revision including pre-or post-publication stages.
